channel.title: Npcs, Pick-pocketing, etc
channel.description:
Hello guy's I've been away from the help area for a while, mainly because I've not come across any problems. But recently I noticed I have no clue how to add an npc, not just spawn them like ::npc, but actually making them stay.
Also when I did spawn the npc I noticed every time I tried to pick-pocket it disconnected me, I would imagine it would say it was an manhandled packet.
P.S: this is a 317 server.

item.title: Npcs, Pick-pocketing, etc
item.dc:creator: @Desetto Desetto
item.description:
@Desetto wrote:

What do you mean by the autospawn stopped working? Did you indent everything properly?

Read full topic

item.title: Npcs, Pick-pocketing, etc
item.dc:creator: @superpersonxd superpersonxd
item.description:
@superpersonxd wrote:

pure kirk:

you have to add the npc in client.java in thieving area, or dude just stick to stalls

Yeah, I tried in auto-spawn and I had to rid of it because it messed it up. How do I add it to the client.java?

Read full topic

item.title: Npcs, Pick-pocketing, etc
item.dc:creator: @superpersonxd superpersonxd
item.description:
@superpersonxd wrote:

ChaosPkers:

Go to the config folder and go to Autospawn and it’s self explanatory from there.

OMG, I’m so retarded I totally forgot about that, well thanks.

I still don’t know about pickpocketing and how to make it add thieve exp.

Read full topic
